Hello Leo,

 

Kindly find below the link to download the .exe installer.

https://excel-addin.dnext.io/prod/setup.exe



Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Saber Khalfallah 
Sent: Thursday, December 4, 2025 18:17
To: 'Leo Troubat' <Leo.Troubat@trafigura.com>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Add in for Trafigura

 

Hello Leo,

 

Kindly find below the link to the downloadble setup installer,

https://excel-addin.dnext.io/prod/setup.exe

I have also attached the compressed .exe file for your convenience.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Leo Troubat <Leo.Troubat@trafigura.com <mailto:Leo.Troubat@trafigura.com> > 
Sent: Thursday, December 4, 2025 18:14
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io <mailto:bastien.lambert@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: Add in for Trafigura

 

Hello

 

Is there a .exe file I should Install or you could send here ? Need to get it approved first

 

Thanks

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> > 
Sent: 03 December 2025 14:47
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >; Leo Troubat <Leo.Troubat@trafigura.com <mailto:Leo.Troubat@trafigura.com> >
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io <mailto:bastien.lambert@dnext.io> >
Subject: [EXTERNAL] RE: Add in for Trafigura

 

Hi Léo,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Happy to help get the add-in installed and set up your query.

 

Could you share your availability for a quick call so we can run through it together? 

 

Best regards

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io <mailto:bastien.lambert@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Wednesday, December 3, 2025 14:31
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >; Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >
Cc: Léo Troubat <leo.troubat@trafigura.com <mailto:leo.troubat@trafigura.com> >
Subject: Add in for Trafigura

 

Hi Saber,

 

Léo, in copy of this email, wants to access some data into excel.

Is it possible to help him install the add-in please ? and show how to use.

The dataset that he needs to access is the following, please make sure it is shared with Trafigura environment.

"DATASET"."dnexr-structured-uscensus-gno-usa-tf_customs-monthly"

 

I use an SQL power query myself, this is what I do.

The goal would be to replicate the output of this on his excel.

 

Thanks !

 

****THE SQL CODE BELOW***

 

SELECT "Country Partner":"Name"::string as "Country Partner", "Trade Direction":"Code"::string as "Trade Direction",

CASE 

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1501' THEN 'FATPAP' 

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1502' THEN 'FATBAS'

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1503' THEN 'LARD'

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1516' THEN 'UCO1516'

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1518' THEN 'UCO1518' 

    ELSE '' 

END as "Product", "Quantity", "Date Reporter"

FROM "DATASET"."dnexr-structured-uscensus-gno-usa-tf_customs-monthly"

WHERE LEFT("Product":"Source",4) IN ('1501','1502','1503','1516','1518')

This email and any attachments are confidential and access to this email or attachment by anyone other than the addressee is unauthorised. If you are not the intended recipient please notify the sender and permanently delete the email including any attachments. You must not copy, disclose or distribute any of the contents to any other person. Personal views or opinions are solely those of the author and not of Trafigura Group Pte Ltd or its affiliates (the “Group”). The Group does not guarantee that the integrity of this communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of viruses, interceptions or interference. From: Leo Troubat <Leo.Troubat@trafigura.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 4, 2025 18:14
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Add in for Trafigura

 

Hello

 

Is there a .exe file I should Install or you could send here ? Need to get it approved first

 

Thanks

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: 03 December 2025 14:47
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; Leo Troubat <Leo.Troubat@trafigura.com>
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Subject: [EXTERNAL] RE: Add in for Trafigura

 

Hi Léo,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Happy to help get the add-in installed and set up your query.

 

Could you share your availability for a quick call so we can run through it together?

 

Best regards

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

 

 

From: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Sent: Wednesday, December 3, 2025 14:31
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Cc: Léo Troubat <leo.troubat@trafigura.com>
Subject: Add in for Trafigura

 

Hi Saber,

 

Léo, in copy of this email, wants to access some data into excel.

Is it possible to help him install the add-in please ? and show how to use.

The dataset that he needs to access is the following, please make sure it is shared with Trafigura environment.

"DATASET"."dnexr-structured-uscensus-gno-usa-tf_customs-monthly"

 

I use an SQL power query myself, this is what I do.

The goal would be to replicate the output of this on his excel.

 

Thanks !

 

****THE SQL CODE BELOW***

 

SELECT "Country Partner":"Name"::string as "Country Partner", "Trade Direction":"Code"::string as "Trade Direction",

CASE

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1501' THEN 'FATPAP'

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1502' THEN 'FATBAS'

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1503' THEN 'LARD'

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1516' THEN 'UCO1516'

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1518' THEN 'UCO1518'

    ELSE ''

END as "Product", "Quantity", "Date Reporter"

FROM "DATASET"."dnexr-structured-uscensus-gno-usa-tf_customs-monthly"

WHERE LEFT("Product":"Source",4) IN ('1501','1502','1503','1516','1518')

This email and any attachments are confidential and access to this email or attachment by anyone other than the addressee is unauthorised. If you are not the intended recipient please notify the sender and permanently delete the email including any attachments. You must not copy, disclose or distribute any of the contents to any other person.     WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1502' THEN 'FATBAS'

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1503' THEN 'LARD'

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1516' THEN 'UCO1516'

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1518' THEN 'UCO1518' 

    ELSE '' 

END as "Product", "Quantity", "Date Reporter"

FROM "DATASET"."dnexr-structured-uscensus-gno-usa-tf_customs-monthly"

WHERE LEFT("Product":"Source",4) IN ('1501','1502','1503','1516','1518')
emails.body_html:
Hi Léo,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Happy to help get the add-in installed and set up your query.

 

Could you share your availability for a quick call so we can run through it together?

 

Best regards

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

 

 

From: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Sent: Wednesday, December 3, 2025 14:31
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Cc: Léo Troubat <leo.troubat@trafigura.com>
Subject: Add in for Trafigura

 

Hi Saber,

 

Léo, in copy of this email, wants to access some data into excel.

Is it possible to help him install the add-in please ? and show how to use.

The dataset that he needs to access is the following, please make sure it is shared with Trafigura environment.

"DATASET"."dnexr-structured-uscensus-gno-usa-tf_customs-monthly"

 

I use an SQL power query myself, this is what I do.

The goal would be to replicate the output of this on his excel.

 

Thanks !

 

****THE SQL CODE BELOW***

 

SELECT "Country Partner":"Name"::string as "Country Partner", "Trade Direction":"Code"::string as "Trade Direction",

CASE

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1501' THEN 'FATPAP'

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1502' THEN 'FATBAS'

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1503' THEN 'LARD'

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1516' THEN 'UCO1516'

    WHEN LEFT("Product":"Source",4) = '1518' THEN 'UCO1518'

    ELSE ''

END as "Product", "Quantity", "Date Reporter"

FROM "DATASET"."dnexr-structured-uscensus-gno-usa-tf_customs-monthly"

WHERE LEFT("Product":"Source",4) IN ('1501','1502','1503','1516','1518')
